item.title: Israeli strikes across Gaza kill 114 people, hospitals and rescuers say
item.description: Fifty-six were killed in the south when homes and tents sheltering displaced families were bombed overnight, a hospital says.

item.title: Mexican judge arrested over 2014 disappearance of 43 students
item.description: Lambertina Galeana Mar√≠n is suspected of having been behind the disappearance of key CCTV footage.

item.title: Trump: Nothing's going to happen until Putin and I get together
item.description: The BBC asked President Trump whether he was disappointed by the level of the delegation that Russia sent to Turkey.

item.title: Watch: Moment Ben & Jerry's co-founder interrupts RFK Jr speech
item.description: The co-founder of Ben & Jerry's, Ben Cohen, was part of a protest in the US Senate.

item.title: Gambia probes sale of ex-leader's luxury cars, cows and boats
item.description: An investigative report says some state officials sold Jammeh's assets to themselves at low prices.
